body_html:
I have tried that also. If I leaving the blank line - bash exiting to windows. Also I have tried I:\Anaconda3 and \i\Anaconda3 paths and got errors:

pavel@brans C:/tensorflow
$ ./configure
C:/tensorflow C:/tensorflow
Found possible Python library paths:
I:\Anaconda3
I:\Anaconda3\lib\site-packages
Please input the desired Python library path to use. Default is [I:\Anaconda3]
\i\Anaconda3

ERROR: Invalid python library path:i.Anaconda3

pavel@brans C:/tensorflow
$ ./configure
C:/tensorflow C:/tensorflow
Found possible Python library paths:
I:\Anaconda3\lib\site-packages
I:\Anaconda3
Please input the desired Python library path to use. Default is [I:\Anaconda3\lib\site-packages]
I:\Anaconda3
ERROR: Invalid python library path: I:Anaconda3.

Also I have tried using export command to set up vars:
pavel@brans C:/tensorflow
$ export TMPDIR="C:/tmp"

pavel@brans C:/tensorflow
$ export BAZEL_SH="C:/tools/msys64/usr/bin/bash"

pavel@brans C:/tensorflow
$ export PYTHON_BIN_PATH="I:/Anaconda3/python"

pavel@brans C:/tensorflow
$ export BAZEL_PYTHON="I:/Anaconda3/python"

pavel@brans C:/tensorflow
$ export BAZEL_VS="E:/Program Files (x86)/Microsoft Visual Studio 14.0" (by the way you can take it from %VS140COMNTOOLS%\..\.. environment var)

pavel@brans C:/tensorflow
$ export PATH="/I/Anaconda3:$PATH"

then:

bazel clean --expunge

and:

$ bazel build -c opt --cpu=x64_windows_msvc --host_cpu=x64_windows_msvc --copt="/w" --verbose_failures --experimental_u
i tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package
ERROR: CreateFile(C:\tmp_bazel_pavel\s7kGbK8z\install): The system cannot find the file specified.
(2)
Killed non-responsive server process (pid=286036)
...............
WARNING: C:/tensorflow/tensorflow/tensorflow.bzl:29:5:
Current Bazel is not a release version, cannot check for compatibility.
WARNING: C:/tensorflow/tensorflow/tensorflow.bzl:30:5: Make sure that you are running at least Bazel 0.3.2.
ERROR: C:/tensorflow/tensorflow/core/BUILD:1117:1: no such target '//tensorflow/tools/git:gen/spec.json': target 'gen/spec.json' not declared in package 'tensorflow/tools/git' defined by C:/tensorflow/tensorflow/tools/git/BUILD and referenced by '//tensorflow/core:version_info_gen'
ERROR: C:/tensorflow/tensorflow/core/BUILD:1117:1: no such target '//tensorflow/tools/git:gen/head': target 'gen/head' not declared in package 'tensorflow/tools/git' defined by C:/tensorflow/tensorflow/tools/git/BUILD and referenced by '//tensorflow/core:version_info_gen'
ERROR: C:/tensorflow/tensorflow/core/BUILD:1117:1: no such target '//tensorflow/tools/git:gen/branch_ref': target 'gen/branch_ref' not declared in package 'tensorflow/tools/git' defined by C:/tensorflow/tensorflow/tools/git/BUILD and referenced by '//tensorflow/core:version_info_gen'
ERROR: Analysis of target '//tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package' failed; build aborted
INFO: Elapsed time: 25.718s
FAILED: Build did NOT complete successfully

Maybe msys64->Win10 issue?

body:
I have tried that also. If I leaving the blank line - bash exiting to windows. Also I have tried  I:\Anaconda3 and  \i\Anaconda3 paths and got errors:

pavel@brans  C:/tensorflow
$ ./configure
C:/tensorflow C:/tensorflow
Found possible Python library paths:
  I:\Anaconda3
  I:\Anaconda3\lib\site-packages
Please input the desired Python library path to use.  Default is [I:\Anaconda3]
\i\Anaconda3


ERROR: Invalid python library path:i.Anaconda3

pavel@brans  C:/tensorflow
$ ./configure
C:/tensorflow C:/tensorflow
Found possible Python library paths:
  I:\Anaconda3\lib\site-packages
  I:\Anaconda3
Please input the desired Python library path to use.  Default is [I:\Anaconda3\lib\site-packages]
 I:\Anaconda3
ERROR: Invalid python library path: I:Anaconda3.


Also I have tried using export command to set up vars:
pavel@brans  C:/tensorflow
$ export TMPDIR="C:/tmp"

pavel@brans  C:/tensorflow
$ export BAZEL_SH="C:/tools/msys64/usr/bin/bash"

pavel@brans  C:/tensorflow
$ export PYTHON_BIN_PATH="I:/Anaconda3/python"

pavel@brans  C:/tensorflow
$ export BAZEL_PYTHON="I:/Anaconda3/python"

pavel@brans  C:/tensorflow
$ export BAZEL_VS="E:/Program Files (x86)/Microsoft Visual Studio 14.0" __(by the way you can take it from %VS140COMNTOOLS%\\..\\.. environment var)__

pavel@brans  C:/tensorflow
$ export PATH="/I/Anaconda3:$PATH"

**then:** 

bazel clean --expunge

**and:**

$ bazel build -c opt --cpu=x64_windows_msvc --host_cpu=x64_windows_msvc --copt="/w" --verbose_failures --experimental_u
i tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package
ERROR: CreateFile(C:\tmp\_bazel_pavel\s7kGbK8z\install): The system cannot find the file specified.
 (2)
Killed non-responsive server process (pid=286036)
...............
WARNING: C:/tensorflow/tensorflow/tensorflow.bzl:29:5:
Current Bazel is not a release version, cannot check for compatibility.
WARNING: C:/tensorflow/tensorflow/tensorflow.bzl:30:5: Make sure that you are running at least Bazel 0.3.2.
ERROR: C:/tensorflow/tensorflow/core/BUILD:1117:1: no such target '//tensorflow/tools/git:gen/spec.json': target 'gen/spec.json' not declared in package 'tensorflow/tools/git' defined by C:/tensorflow/tensorflow/tools/git/BUILD and referenced by '//tensorflow/core:version_info_gen'
ERROR: C:/tensorflow/tensorflow/core/BUILD:1117:1: no such target '//tensorflow/tools/git:gen/head': target 'gen/head' not declared in package 'tensorflow/tools/git' defined by C:/tensorflow/tensorflow/tools/git/BUILD and referenced by '//tensorflow/core:version_info_gen'
ERROR: C:/tensorflow/tensorflow/core/BUILD:1117:1: no such target '//tensorflow/tools/git:gen/branch_ref': target 'gen/branch_ref' not declared in package 'tensorflow/tools/git' defined by C:/tensorflow/tensorflow/tools/git/BUILD and referenced by '//tensorflow/core:version_info_gen'
ERROR: Analysis of target '//tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package' failed; build aborted
INFO: Elapsed time: 25.718s
FAILED: Build did NOT complete successfully

Maybe msys64->Win10 issue?
